query:
SELECT t.id, t.name, COUNT(r.id) as route_count 
FROM trip t 
LEFT JOIN trip_routes r ON t.id = r.tripId 
WHERE t.name LIKE '%Slovakia%' 
GROUP BY t.id, t.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT t.id, t.name, COUNT(r.id) as route_count 
FROM trip t 
LEFT JOIN trip_routes r ON t.id = r.tripId 
WHERE t.name LIKE '%Slovakia%' 
GROUP BY t.id, t.name;
